timeline.bodyText:
Can we use optional here?
I always aim to minimize nulls ;)
timeline.author: benjamineckstein

replies.bodyText: unfortunately we can't. We are extending the Mybatis TypeHandler class and are bound to its signature
replies.author: mustaphazorgati

timeline.bodyText: depending on map size ... this could be time consuming. is this a problem?
timeline.author: benjamineckstein

replies.bodyText:
it's debug. Not production relevant.
+ As soon as we get slf4j 2.0 we will use the lambda method and thus this will be no issue
replies.author: mustaphazorgati

timeline.bodyText: every suppressWarning that we can prevent / refactor is a win !! good job ;)
timeline.author: benjamineckstein
